.
Preparing a Denial
Prepare a formal denial of a
38 U.S.C. 1151
claim using
a locally-generated letter to inform the claimant of the
evidence considered
reasons for the determination, and
procedural and appellate rights.
Important
:  Do not refer to
38 U.S.C. 1151
or the circumstances that warranted the rating in the absence of a specific claim for benefits under
38 U.S.C. 1151
.
